name: Pirates, Not Pals! [PROTOTYPE 1]
description:
A small game I wanted to prototype over a day or so. I programmed the game, make the art/animations, but found the sound effects and music online.

You "bank" a coin by holding onto it for 5 seconds. Once you bank 5 coins you win. Upon death your character will disappear for a few seconds, and then reappear with full health and will still retain their banked coins.

Player1 (just called Player in the game) controls via A/D for left/right, W for jump, and E for attack.

Player2 controls via left/right arrows for left/right, up arrow for jump, and right CTRL for attack.

The game will reset 5 seconds after a player has won.

This game was meant to prototype an idea I had for a somewhat larger game. The larger game would possibly include the following:

  • ability to attack in 4 directions
  • sword, flintlock pistol, bomb
  • dashing/rolling
  • much larger and more dynamic levels
  • changeable hats
  • support for up to 8 players and team/FFA modes
  • online support
  • modifiers such as timers, coins needed to win, attack damage, etc
  • polished gameplay, art, music, sound effects

Thanks for checking out the game! If you want to keep up with me, make sure to follow my twitter: https://twitter.com/klassickent.
